t1.title: Company retreat
t1.text: It's time again for the company's yearly retreat. We will be traveling to our usual spot where we will enjoy a delightful weekend. Activities start on friday March 18 at 6 pm. Our CEO was kind enough to provide a beautiful image of the landscape.

t2.title: Our CEO
t2.text: Our CEO has been with us since the start in 1998.

t3.title:
Charity Drive &
Volunteer Opportunity
t3.text:
As we do every year, we love to give back to
those who need it most - more so at this
time of year. Our annual charity drive is still
ongoing for one more week, clothes and
non-perishable goods will be collected by
December 5 and delivered to three shelters
in the inner-city. If you wish to make any
donations of any kind, please do so soon
that you don't miss your opportunity.
We are also volunteering on Sundays for the
Out of the Cold program organized by local
parishes. For those interested, you can still
sign up. There are 10 Sundays left, 7
different churches, with a need for
volunteers from 3pm-7pm.

t4.title: We are hiring
t4.text:
Good people tend to know good people - help us fill the new role of security specialist.
Refer someone you know, share it on social media, or apply for the job yourself.
As a bonus, we're also offering 2000 kr for successful hires! Email HR for more information.
